short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have fun while your friend goes crazy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the "Like A Joke Chrome Extension" – your ticket to unlocking a world of laughter, whimsy, and delightful surprises in your browsing experience!

Enhance your online adventures with our premium version of the Like A Joke Chrome Extension, packed with exclusive features and premium content designed to bring joy to your digital journey.

Unlock a treasure trove of whimsical features, including:

֍ Color Confusion: Watch as colors on your screen dance and morph in playful ways, adding a touch of magic to every webpage.

֍ Crazy Scroll: Brace yourself for a wild ride as the page takes on a life of its own, spinning and twirling in delightful chaos with each scroll.

֍ Lost Writings: Experience the thrill of mystery as text mysteriously disappears and reappears, keeping you on your toes as you explore the web.

֍ Flipping Page: Turn your browsing experience upside down with pages that flip and twirl like a digital book, adding a whimsical twist to your online adventures.

Plus, gain access to exclusive updates, early access to new features.
